issue.title: [CF 87] Archangel for Priests?
issue.body:
What is the enhancement in mind? How should it look and feel?
Is there any way to track and show when Evangelism or Dark Evangelism has 5 stacks to cast Archangel (when Archangel is off c/d)?

Please provide any additional information below.

Would only like Archangel to show when it is off cooldown and Evangelism or Dark Evangelism has 5 stacks.


> Posted by CurseForge user cosmoose | Imported from CurseForge issue #87 | Raw

comments.body:
Create the following icon:
Type: buff/debuff
Name: Evangelism;Dark Evangelism
Edit alpha/duration/stacks -> check 'Fake Hidden' and check the minimum stacks check button and move the slider to 5
(along with other desired settings)

Then create another icon to track the cooldown of evangelism with the desired settings, and then add a condition (type: icon shown, icon: Evangelism;Dark Evangelism)

Edited Jan 24, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

i must be a complete noob....i have tried to follow your instructions but still fail. Edit alpha/duration/stacks -> check 'Fake Hidden' & (type: icon shown, icon: Evangelism;Dark Evangelism) kind of lost me.....if you can explain a little clearer for a total numptie i would really appreciate it. i can set up most things on the add on but just not archangel.


> Posted by CurseForge user indeep

This ticket is a year old. Those instructions pertained to the old dropdown configuration - no longer relevant to the dialog configuration that TMW v4 uses, and they were also limited by the smaller feature set than exists today. This should be much more useful now:

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SConditionAlpha^N0.5 ^SShowWhen^Salways ^SType^Scooldown ^SUnAlpha^N0.5 ^SShowTimerText^B ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SBUFFSTACKS ^SOperator^S>= ^SName^SEvangelism ^SLevel^N5 ^t^N2^T ^SType^SBUFFSTACKS ^SOperator^S>= ^SName^SDark~`Evangelism ^SLevel^N5 ^SAndOr^SOR ^t^Sn^N2 ^t^SEnabled^B ^SName^SArchangel ^t^N48301^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

Note that this has not been tested because I do not have a priest.

For instructions on what to do with this, go here: http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/forum/general/25135-how-to-import-strings/#p1

You should also check out the priest examples forum for some more ideas on what you can do: http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/forum/priest/. There is one thread there that has several examples of setups for tracking Evangelism and Archangel: http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/forum/priest/30233-some-useful-priest-settings/#p1

Edited Jan 24, 2012
